thread.title: Coronation Street

author: Fiona Flynn
title: Coronation Street
text: It's bad news for Tyrone and Fiz tonight as Hope takes a turn for the worst. However it's good news for Gary when Sharif and Yasmeen call at the Windass flat and announce that they'd like to make him a partner in the gym, while Alya changes her mind about eloping saying she was just nervous about the wedding. It's only a matter of time before she confesses though we reckon, or somebody will probably out it in the Rovers in typical Corrie style. Elsewhere, Ken calls into the salon for a trim but his growing affection for Audrey is evident. Ah here. Too soon!
